parameters.name: ClientId
parameters.description: The client ID if you set IdentityType to CLIENT.

parameters.name: IdentityType
parameters.description:
The identity type. Valid values:

*   USER
*   CLIENT

parameters.name: InstanceId
parameters.description: The ID of the Message Queue for MQTT instance.

parameters.name: SignMode
parameters.description: The signature verification mode. ORIGIN: compares the password and the AccessKey secret. SIGNED: uses the HMAC_SHA1 algorithm to sign the client ID to obtain a password and then compares the password.
